Putnam Exam | 2010: A1

\begin{array}{c}\n\text { Putnam 2010: A1 } \\\n\{1, \ldots, n\}=A_{1} \cup \cdots \cup A_{k} \\\n\sum A_{i}=\sum A_{j}\n\end{array}[imath]\text { Putnam 2010: A1 } [/imath] [imath]\{1, \ldots, n\}=A_{1} \cup \cdots \cup A_{k} [/imath] [imath]\sum A_{i}=\sum A_{j}[/imath]
